name: VZError
desc: Errors that you might encounter when configuring or using a virtual machine.

items.name: init(Code, userInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a new error structure with the error code and user information dictionary you provide.

items.name: enum VZError.Code
items.desc: Errors you might encounter when configuring or using a virtual machine.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: The error domain for the Virtualization framework.

items.name: var errorUserInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of additional error-related information.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary containing additional information about the error.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A localized description of the error.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value that identifies this error.

items.name: static var virtualMachineLimitExceeded: VZError.Code
items.desc: Returns an error code that indicates whether the system exceeded the limit on the number of running virtual machines.

items.name: static func != (VZError, VZError) -> Bool
items.desc: Compares two error objects for inequality.
